get.description: Search users based on name selection, for type ahead functions

parameters.name: provider
parameters.description: The name of the provider to delegate the research to. If not available, then it will search the main directory

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: The typeahead query, expressed as a simple search string

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: The number of entries to skip in the result

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of entries to return

parameters.name: attributes
parameters.description: A list of attribute names, separated by a coma, to return for each entry. Empty means the default attribute list

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: Specific options for the search, expressed as a JSON object. The available options depend on the directory/provider

get.description: Search users in the directory based on selection formula

parameters.name: provider
parameters.description: The name of the provider to delegate the research to. If not available, then it will search the main directory

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: The selection query, expressed in a LDAP like query language

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: The number of entries to skip in the result

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of entries to return

parameters.name: attributes
parameters.description: A list of attribute names, separated by a coma, to return for each entry. Empty means the default attribute list

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: Specific options for the search, expressed as a JSON object. The available options depend on the directory/provider

basicAuth.description: HTTP Basic Authentication. Works over 'HTTP' and 'HTTPS'
